title: Ticket #716: condor_c-gahp should assume -f to run in foreground
description:
The condor_c-gahp is built using DaemonCore and defaults to daemonizing on startup. Since the GAHP is intended to interact over stdin/stdout, this is pretty much always the wrong behavior. It's a nuisance to clean up after if you're trying to test with the GAHP correctly and for the the -f option.

Proposed change: the condor_c-gahp should always use foreground behavior (as though it was run with -f)
